reviewText: This is a very funny movie.  Running under an hour so you never get bored.  In this film 3 children are off to London to deliver a Christmas Tree.  Endless laughs and a heart that is a big as the Christmas Star. This is not shown that I know of on American television.  Buy it!  It is worth it!  Buy it and share it  / loan to other people,  It is 10x better than the average Christmas Movie  I love this film.  Oneof the best Christmas theme movies I have ever seen.  And I have seen over 300!
This movie was okay but one time of watching it was enough.

The Christmas Tree is a delightful movie made by United Kingdom's Children's Film Foundation in 1966. The story concerns three young siblings transporting a Christmas tree to a friend in a children's hospital on Christmas eve.

This must be one of those programs shown on the Children's Film Festival that I watched as a child.  I had never heard of this film though.  It is very heartwarming and funny.  I'm going to add it to my Christmas traditions.
